channel.title: Cant get owner of my server! plz help
channel.description:
guys I cant be owner of my own server I tried everything I went first to my source searched for my name and edited the rights to 3! Saved it then and compiled it. I closed runserver.bat and opened again and restarted my client! But still not a owner. I think my compiler sucks it doesnt compile anything else can someone give me then a good compile code.
Btw do i need to restart my server if I change something in my source that I compiled? Or isnt that needed? BTW is there no program for that too?
PLz help guys

item.title: Cant get owner of my server! plz help
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

[quote=“razami, post:3, topic:358163”][quote author=bily123 link=topic=454669.msg3329210#msg3329210 date=1283352536]
Your supposed to log off your account> change your rank in file> save> (no need to compile)> log back onto your account.
[/quote]

CHage the 0 to 3 1=mod 2 =admin, 3=owner 4=hidden.[/quote]

4= hidden Co-owner/Admin

Read full topic
item.source: Cant get owner of my server! plz help

item.title: Cant get owner of my server! plz help
item.dc:creator: @razami razami
item.description:
@razami wrote:

bily123:

Your supposed to log off your account> change your rank in file> save> (no need to compile)> log back onto your account.

CHage the 0 to 3 1=mod 2 =admin, 3=owner 4=hidden.

Read full topic
